name: It Was The Saddest Porn
description:
As inspired by Episode 18 of the Podquisition, It Was The Saddest Porn explores the complex paths that life takes on. "Adds a refreshing and much-needed nihilist approach to the visual novel genre!" raves a literal sockpuppet I just put on my hand and made say those words.

This is a demo, and the first game I've ever made. Three main paths are planned, only one is fully executed - I just wanted to get a minimum viable product like thing up, going from idea to playable thing in about 7 hours as a personal game jam type of deal. I will be finishing the game, and relatively soon.

Enjoy?

Includes crudely drawn representations of anatomy, so 18+ish?
